description:
The Scott Law Firm in Conroe, Texas, aggressively advocates on behalf of personal injury clients. Following an accident or incident that results in an injury, the most important thing is to receive the health care needed to get better. Unfortunately, insurance tactics such as denying or delaying claims, combined with lost wages can make one’s recovery nearly impossible if not stressful. When clients turn to Scott Law Firm, experience and resources are used to uphold the client’s rights and fight for the compensation they deserve.

Scott Law Firm has tried numerous personal injury cases to verdict. Types of cases handled are:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Dog bites
  • Motor vehicle defects
  • Premises liability
  • Brain injuries
  • Wrongful death

Managing attorney Patrick Scott proudly served in the United States Marine Corps after graduating from high school. During his four-year tour of duty, he received a Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal as well as several other recognitions. Mr. Scott is licensed to practice law in Texas, Oklahoma and Louisiana. He also speaks Spanish.
